content: {"Name": "Metropolitan Baptist Church", "Entity_Id": 405, "Category": "Food Pantry", "Subcategory": "Food Pantries within the Capital District", "Organization": "Metropolitan Baptist Church", "More_Information": "Guests can visit twice a month, Walk ins welcome. wait upstairs in sanctuary, then downstairs in groups no larger than 3", "Counties": ["Albany"], "Location": "Albany", "Address": "105 Second Street", "City": "Albany", "State": "NY", "Zip": "12210", "Phone": "5184659375", "Hours_of_Operation": "2nd Sat 10:00 am - 12:00 pm; 4th Tuesday 10:00 - 12:00 pm", "Cost": "", "Accepts": "", "Website": "", "Coalition": 1, "CFAN": 0, "Latitude": "42.65997", "Longitude": "-73.75544", "Last_Updated": "02-06-2024", "icon": "marker-F42000", "collection_name": "Food Pantries within the Capital District", "collection_category": "Food Pantry"}
